ping.name: Ping

classes.name: InstaClient
classes.description: InstaClient, the main hub for interacting with the Instagram API.

props.name: ready
props.description: Whether the bot is connected and ready.

methods.name: fetchUser
methods.description: Fetch a user and cache it.

params.name: query
params.description: The ID or the username of the user to fetch.

params.name: force
params.description: Whether the cache should be ignored

methods.name: login
methods.description: Log the bot in to Instagram

params.name: username
params.description: The username of the Instagram account.

params.name: password
params.description: The password of the Instagram account.

params.name: state
params.description: Optional state object. It can be generated using client.ig.exportState().
